main event: Several residents observed unidentified flying objects over Richmond, Indiana, on May 7, 1954.
interesting points: Mrs. Cleo Hagen reported seeing a bright, round yellowish-white object hovering in the sky for 2-3 minutes., Two high school students, James C. and Joseph B., observed a fast-moving object changing shape before disappearing., The objects were described as being round and metallic in appearance, with sizes ranging from 30 to 60 feet in diameter., Multiple witnesses, including local residents and police officers, confirmed the sightings., Investigators from the USAF's Project Blue Book were unable to conclusively identify the objects and documented the incidents.
witness description: Mrs. John Doe, Mrs. Cleo Hagen, two high school students, and several local residents.
